string.text: On Strelok's tracks
Find any information regarding Strelok in the underground parts of the scientific research institute "Medpribor"
Give the newfound information to Vedrov
Find a note addressed to Strelok, which is somewhere in Rostock. To be more precise, it should be looked for somewhere in an unfinished building.
Give the note to Vedrov
Talk to Sidorovich
Kill the "sales representative"
Get back to Sidorovich
Talk to Novikov about decrypting the PDA
Find Strelok
Strelok's hiding somewhere in Zaton. You must find him and eliminate him.
Report to Vedrov on the assignment
Tell Vedrov the approximate location of Strelok
Search for the missing squad
Find the missing reconnaissance squad
Report back to Vedrov
Find the rescued stalker
Find the stalker saved by Clear Sky
Report back to Vedrov
Talk to Novikov
Talk to Novikov about repairing the PDA
Talk to Vedrov
Report to Vedrov the information received
Talk to Snitch
Ask Snitch about a Mercenary, Scar
Find the missing stalker
Find Stepan Fearless, under Snitch's request
Tell Snitch about the death of his friend
Find the mercenary Scar
Meet with Scar and learn all the details of that fateful day from him
Report back to Vedrov
Tell Vedrov about Scar and about the squad's ultimate fate
Find the stolen box
Find a box stolen by unknown robbers
Give the box to Owl
Prevent the negotiations between Freedom and Mercenaries
Kill the mercenaries
Tell some phony story to Black
Clear the Abandoned Hospital
Eliminate all the infidels in the Abandoned Hospital
Report back to Preacher
Steal the documents from the checkpoint
Steal the military documents detailing plans to seize various territories
Give the documents to Sidorovich
Find a stalker named Sam Tolstoy
Pick up Sidorovich's goods from a stalker
Take back Sidorovich's case from the bandits
Take away from the bandits what belongs to Sidorovich
Give the case to Sidorovich
Find the missing mercenary
Find a mercenary who disappeared along with important documents in the X-16 laboratory.
Documents of the mercenary
Find the documents hidden by a merc
Give to Dushman the documents found in X-16
Valuable case
Find a case with radio equipment. We don't have detailed info, we only know that it is hidden in the depths of the Zone. And the fact the Monolith knows about it, suggests certain ideas...
Bring the valuable case to Dushman
